values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_1
values.value:
Jon didn't care for Craster; he may have once been a formidable man, but age and indifference has turned his features to cruel, sagging lines. He allows the Night's Watch to resupply at his keep in exchange for bribes and solitude. Though he preferred wine over beer, and daughters over sons-- he had found ways of dealing with both to survive.

Craft any Season III or IV event gear to earn points! Earn materials for select gear sets by defeating creatures in the Fight in the Frostfangs event, or by trading Flux in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.

Season III Gear Sets: Night's Watch Ranger, Battle-Scarred, Falcon Knight, Stark Relic, Kingsguard, Conqueror, and Tyrell
Season IV Gear Sets: Baelish, Thorned Bride, Faceless Men Robes, Dragonkeeper Armor, Brotherhood Archer, Blackwater Defender, Usurper

Crafting any Season III or Season IV gear awards points toward this event, but only select materials are available through the Fight in the Frostfangs event and Flux Recipes. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_2
values.value:
It's not easy to unite the hundred disparate tribes of Free Folk under one leader, but Mance Rayder has done it. An imposing man, and a former brother, Mance deserted the Night's Watch over a decade ago. Now, Jon must convince him that he's done the same. Recalling the cruelty he witnessed at Crastor's Keep, the words come easily-- he wants to fight for the side that fights for the living.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials by defeating non-event creatures in the Icy Ascent event for the following Trinket Collections:

House Arryn, House Mormont, House Targaryen, House Martell, Artifacts of Winter, Dragon Rider Artifacts

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_3
values.value:
The wildling attack has begun. Jon Snow defects and is able to warn his brothers just in time, but their numbers are limited. Giants, mammoths, and an impressive wildling army waits to the north, but the imminent danger lies south. While the majority of the Night's Watch's force rains fire atop the Wall, who will stop the sortie at Mole's Town led by Tormund Giantsbane?

Craft any Season I and Season II event gear to earn points! Earn materials for select gear sets by defeating creatures in the Moment’s Hesitation event, or by trading Flux in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.

Season I Gear Sets: Stark, Lannister, Faith Militant, Dothraki, Qartheen, Corsair, Blackfyre, Wildling, Mormont, and Reaver
Season II Gear Sets: Braavosi Trader, Kingswood, Whent, Bolton, Siege Engineer, Dornish, and Dragon Knight

Crafting any Season I or Season II gear awards points toward this event, but only select materials are available through the Moment’s Hesitation event and Flux Recipes. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_4
values.value:
With Jeor Mormont’s passing, the Night’s Watch must elect a new lord commander. Despite Jon's reluctance, Samwell Tarly puts his name forth as a candidate, alongside Alliser Thorne... The final vote is cast by Maester Aemon, breaking the tie and naming Jon Snow as the 998th Lord Commander of the Night’s Watch.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials by defeating non-event creatures in the Hardhome event for the following Trinket Collections:

House Manderly, Valyrian Dragon, House Baratheon, Artifacts of R'hllor, House Whent Heirlooms, Northern Artifacts. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_5
values.value:
A chill wind blows through Castle Black the night that Jon Snow dies. Lured to the courtyard to recieve news of Benjen Stark, he is instead faced with a crowd of his brothers. A crude wooden sign reading TRAITOR makes the opinion of the gathering clear. Ser Alliser Thorne's blade is the first to stab Jon, but it is not the last. “For the watch,” they say, as each takes their turn. Their mutinous deeds concluded, they leave their Lord Commander to bleed out in the snow...

Craft any Season V or VI event gear to earn points! Earn materials for select gear sets by defeating creatures in the Valar Morghulis event, or by trading Flux in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.

Season V Gear Sets: Dornish Royal, Lost Ranger, Crow Slayer, Keep Architect, War Hound, Tourney Queen, Fiery Zealot

Season VI Gear Sets: Queen of Lions, Drowned Disciple, Unleashed Warrior, Crannogman Trapper, Northern Guardian, Rimed Revenant, Highgarden Socialite
Crafting any Season V or VI gear awards points toward this event, but only select materials are available through the Valar Morghulis event and Flux Recipes. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_6
values.value:
When Jon Snow took the Night's Watch oath, he swore that he would live and die at his post, and so he has. His final act as Lord Commander is to hang the mutineers who murdered him. Ned Stark taught him that the man who passes the sentence should swing the sword, and so he does-- then he hands off his cloak as he walks away from it all. It is time to return to Winterfell.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials by defeating non-event creatures in the Battle of the Bastards event for the following Trinket Collections:

House Stark, House Lannister, House Greyjoy, Artifacts of Astapor, Night's Watch Artifacts

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_7
values.value:
House Stark's bannermen require convincing before they follow Jon. He's a bastard, the wounds from Robb Stark's war and the Red Wedding are still fresh, and winter has come. Many would rather return to their keeps and hunker down. But the enemy they face will not wait out the storm— they bring the storm with them. Jon must unite his father's bannermen to once again stand behind House Stark, or the North will not survive the war to come.

Craft any Season VII event gear to earn points! Earn materials for select gear sets by defeating creatures in the Queen Meets King event, or by trading Flux in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.

Season VII Gear Sets: Ironborn Captain, Laughing Knight, Citadel Inquisitor, Fledgling Squire, Winter Survivor, Storm Lord, Iron Keyholder

Crafting any Season VII gear awards points toward this event, but only select materials are available through the Queen Meets King event and Flux Recipes. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_8
values.value:
Jon and his unlikely allies venture north of the Wall once more to prove to those in King's Landing that the risen dead are a threat to all of Westeros. Daenerys must retreat to ensure the mission's success— sacrificing both Viserion and Jon to the Night King. But as the frost sets in, the uncle he'd sought for so long reappears, trading his life to buy Jon enough time to escape. With proof in hand, there's no time to delay. The Wall that's stood for a thousand years can no longer hold the dead and their newly taken dragon at bay.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials by defeating non-event creatures in the King Who Knelt event for the following Trinket Collections:

House Baelish, Dothraki Heirlooms, House Tyrell, Conqueror's Heirlooms, Targaryen Prince Artifacts

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_9
values.value:
The fastest mode of travel in Westeros is by dragonback, a privilege few have experienced since before the fall of House Targaryen. That Daenerys would trust Jon to ride one of her dragons shows how much their relationship has grown. The fact that Rhaegal allows him him to approach without protest is perhaps even more meaningful. The dragons may recognize something that Jon has yet to understand himself...

Craft any Season VII event gear to earn points! Earn materials for select gear sets by defeating creatures in the Married in Secret event, or by trading Flux in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.

Season VII Gear Sets: Ironborn Captain, Laughing Knight, Citadel Inquisitor, Fledgling Squire, Winter Survivor, Storm Lord, Iron Keyholder

Crafting any Season VII gear awards points toward this event, but only select materials are available through the Married in Secret event and Flux Recipes. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_PVE_1
values.value:
Jon joins Quorin Halfhand to scout rumors of a wildling army assembling in the Frostfangs. They dispatch a wildling patrol along the way, though Jon shows mercy to one among them. Her name is Ygritte, with hair so red she would be called "kissed by fire." Her tongue has fire too, hurling insults as deftly as any spear. Their victory is short-lived, however, when a second wildling party ambushes the rangers. Now prisoners themselves, Quorin knows the only way to earn their captor's trust is for Jon to put him to the sword. In doing so, he jeopardizes his place among the Night's Watch, and establishes another among the Wildlings.

Defeat Seasonal Caravans to earn points! Seasonal Caravans drop necessary crafting materials for the Craster’s Keep event. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_PVE_2
values.value:
Forced to give up information, Jon Snow knows he cannot fully betray his brothers. He inflates the number of Night's Watchmen within, and lies that their defense are strong, in hopes of delaying the inevitable. The lie will soon be revealed though, as he joins a war party scaling the Wall. It is a treacherous climb, but the Wildlings are resilient as ever-- more make it to the other side than not, and Castle Black is now flanked.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for trinkets, which can be crafted for points in the King-Beyond-the-Wall event. Materials earned come from the following Trinket Collections:

House Arryn, House Mormont, House Targaryen, House Martell, Artifacts of Winter, Dragon Rider Artifacts. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_PVE_3
values.value:
Ygritte is adept with a bow. She is clever and efficient in combat, never flinching. But when she has Jon Snow in her sights, arrow nocked and ready, she hesitates. That moment is all it takes... There is shock on both of their faces as an unseen arrow pierces her chest. 
“We should have stayed in that cave.”
“We’ll go back.”
“You know nothing, Jon Snow.”

Defeat Seasonal Caravans to earn points! Seasonal Caravans drop necessary crafting materials for the Castle Black Under Siege event. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_PVE_4
values.value:
Jon journeys to Hardhome, the last retreat of the Wildlings, to seek their support against the wight army. The mission is disrupted when the settlement is attacked-- on the cliffs above, the Night King surveys the chaos and bides his time. When not a single living soul remains on the shore, he raises his arms. Wildlings who had just fallen moments before shamble to their feet. An eerie silence swallows the bay as the army of the dead, now five thousand bodies stronger, watches the retreating survivors with piercing blue eyes.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for trinkets, which can be crafted for points in the Lord Commander event. Materials earned come from the following Trinket Collections:

House Manderly, Valyrian Dragon, House Baratheon, Artifacts of R'hllor, House Whent Heirlooms, Northern Artifacts. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_PVE_5
values.value:
Few in the room believe that the Red Woman can resurrect Jon Snow from the dead, but all hold out hope. Even when he opens his eyes, when he begins to breathe again, it's hard to ignore the gruesome wounds on his chest. They serve as a stark reminder: he should not be here... and yet he is. What will he do now with the life he has recovered?

Defeat Seasonal Caravans to earn points! Seasonal Caravans drop necessary crafting materials for the Mutiny in Castle Black event. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_PVE_6
values.value:
Jon reunites with his sister Sansa tearfully-- in the years since Jon left, she suffered cruelly at the hands of the Lannisters and now Ramsay Bolton. The pack survives, however, and with Stannis Baratheon and the Wildling armies on their side, Ramsay's sadistic reign will come to an end.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for trinkets, which can be crafted for points in the A Crow No More event. Materials earned come from the following Trinket Collections:

House Stark, House Lannister, House Greyjoy, Artifacts of Astapor, Night's Watch Artifacts. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_PVE_7
values.value:
First impressions are important. Jon's first impression on Daenerys Targaryen... could be better. He refuses to bow or call her queen, and weighs the suspicions of his people against her. Yet he must convince her to join them against the threat in the north. Will he judge a daughter by the sins of her father, or will he honor the pledges made by his ancestors to hers?

Defeat Seasonal Caravans to earn points! Seasonal Caravans drop necessary crafting materials for the King in the North event. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_PVE_8
values.value:
It is hard to deny what one sees with their own eyes. Daenerys, now fully understanding the threat of the wight army and the power of the Night King who leads it, pledges her support to Jon. He, too, has had a change of heart. Daenerys has impressed him with her honorable actions, her leadership, her strength. In return, he offers to bend the knee, and calls her his queen.

"We're going to destroy the Night King and his army. We'll do it together. You have my word."

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for trinkets, which can be crafted for points in the Beyond the Wall event. Materials earned come from the following Trinket Collections:

House Baelish, Dothraki Heirlooms, House Tyrell, Conqueror's Heirlooms, Targaryen Prince Artifacts

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_PVE_9
values.value:
A peaceful afternoon eighteen years ago, a secret wedding among the trees, a child born from the forbidden union between the wolf and the dragon... Bran saw these events and more when he became the Three-Eyed Raven. Sam has the final piece to the puzzle, recalling from the High Septon’s journal that Rhaegar Targaryen’s previous marriage had been anulled, making his marriage to Lyanna Stark legitimate. Jon knows nothing about his true bloodline, and upon discovery, must decide what to do with what that knowledge portends...

Defeat Seasonal Caravans to earn points! Seasonal Caravans drop necessary crafting materials for the First Flight event. 
Part of the 'Wolf Reborn' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_JONSNOW2_UMBRELLA_1
values.value:
Jon Snow joins his brothers in the Great Ranging, his first expedition north of the Wall. The hunt for his lost uncle will uncover so much more: fearsome enemies only heard of in old wives' tales, unconventional allies, and a glimpse of unspeakable terrors yet to come. The man who will return from this journey is not the same Night's Watch recruit who left, and his metamorphosis is far from over.

The The Wolf Reborn highlights a special month of crafting! Get caught up with previous Trinkets and all Seasons' Gear!

*Catch up on past gear sets and bolster your armory!
*Catch up on past trinkets and fill out your collections!
*Earn limited-time rewards for participating in the 'Wolf Reborn', the Ghost Hero Card and Longclaw March Pawn!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_188
values.value: Prepare for the new Northern Noble gear set!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_189
values.value: Use Northern Fox Pelts to craft this splendid gear!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_190
values.value: “Show me the path I must walk and do not let me stumble in the dark places that lie ahead.”

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_191
values.value: Craft this ring and brace your troops for the coming frost!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_138
values.value: Level up Grey Worm, Maester Luwin, Arya and Missandei!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_139
values.value: Enough Relics to get Hodor and Daenerys to level 20!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_140
values.value: Accelerate Hodor's growth with this pack!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_141
values.value: Level up Sandor, Varys, Syrio and Arya!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_142
values.value: Level up Gregor, Salladhor, Doran and Ellaria!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_TRINKET_87
values.value: Craft this trinket and show your foes a bear's pride!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_SNOW1_PVE_RALLY_1
values.value:
Dark wings, dark words—Lord Eddard Stark has been executed by the Lannisters. With all haste, Jon rides off to meet his brother Robb and march south to war... but his oath requires he stay or be executed. His brothers in black ride after him, pleading he reconsider. Yet it is in the recitation of their oath that Jon accepts the true weight of his vow, and with a solemn heart, returns home to Castle Black

Defeat Night's Watch Master-At-Arms to earn points! 
Part of the 'As Crow Flies' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_SNOW1_TRADE_2
values.value:
With Benjen Stark missing, Jon joins the Lord Commander's march Beyond the Wall in hopes of finding him.Jon's strength and conviction have already been tested, but now he must face dangers far greater than any before. He knows nothing of what lies beyond the wall...

Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points. This event's Recipes are your last chance to use Braavosi Loan trophies before they are converted into Trader's Scrip! 
Part of the 'As Crow Flies' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_TRINFECTA1_CRAFT_1
values.value:
The weight of knowledge is a heavy burden, but someone must bear it.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials by defeating non-event creatures in the Three-Eyed Raven: Perception I event for the following Trinket Collections:

House Arryn, House Mormont, House Targaryen, House Martell, Artifacts of Winter, Dragon Rider Artifacts

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_TRINFECTA1_PVE_1
values.value:
A single well-placed strike can turn the tide of battle. Know your enemy's weakness and exploit it.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for trinkets, which can be crafted for points in the Three-Eyed Raven: Intuition I event. Materials earned come from the following Trinket Collections:

House Arryn, House Mormont, House Targaryen, House Martell, Artifacts of Winter, Dragon Rider Artifacts

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STPATRICKS_GEMS_1
values.value:
"Merchants from the Jade Sea have arrived on the shores of Westeros with abundant stores of gold!

Celebrate St. Patrick's Day with EVEN MORE GOLD! Using Gems to redeem bundles in the Store awards points towards this event.
If the purchases made with Gems contain Gold, that Gold will contribute to the progress of the separate St. Patrick's Day Celebration Event. Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase. Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends."

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_TESTYOURMETTLE
values.value: In the throes of battle, a legend is born! From the most unlikely of contenders, a Lord can ascend to the summit of power and glory. For 24 hours, they put everything on the line against rival Lords, risking their name for the promise of glory, and perhaps even infamy. The opportunity is yours to seize, to enter the crucible and test your mettle against other mighty Lords from other kingdoms. Journey forth and claim a Seat of Power, defend it with all your might, and inscribe your name in the annals of history. At the end, your actions will judge your valor by how long your capable of holding onto a Seat of Power. But beware, others are vying for glory. Are you prepared to Test Your Mettle?

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_TESTYOURMETTLE_1
values.value: In the throes of battle, a legend is born! From the most unlikely of contenders, a Lord can ascend to the summit of power and glory. For 24 hours, they put everything on the line against rival Lords, risking their name for the promise of glory, and perhaps even infamy. The opportunity is yours to seize, to enter the crucible and test your mettle against other mighty Lords from other kingdoms. Journey forth and claim a Seat of Power, defend it with all your might, and inscribe your name in the annals of history. At the end, your actions will judge your valor by how long your capable of holding onto a Seat of Power. But beware, others are vying for glory. Are you prepared to Test Your Mettle?

values.value: A meeting with the leader of the Free Folk...

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_3
values.value: Where do your true loyalties lie?

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_4
values.value: "He’s the commander we turned to when the night was darkest."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_JONSNOW2_CRAFT_8
values.value: Obtain proof that the dead yet live!

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_JONSNOW2_PVE_4
values.value: "We're all the same to them, meat for their army."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_JONSNOW2_PVE_5
values.value: "The lord let you come back for a reason."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_JONSNOW2_PVE_6
values.value: "You're going to die tomorrow, Lord Bolton. Sleep well."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_JONSNOW2_PVE_7
values.value: "Honor the pledge your ancestor made to mine."

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_JONSNOW2_PVE_8

values.name: ITEM_FLUX_5_DESCRIPTION
values.value: Exchange this in Inventory Recipes to get Season V crafting materials while recipes are active. Flux recipes are useable in future events. Keep an eye on Inventory:Recipes for when these are enabled. (Does not apply to trinket materials.)

values.name: ITEM_FLUX_8_DESCRIPTION
values.value: Exchange this in Inventory Recipes to get Season VIII crafting materials while recipes are active. Flux recipes are usable in future events. Keep an eye on Inventory:Recipes for when these are enabled. (Does not apply to trinket materials.)

values.name: SESSIONREWARD_CSR_ES_SNOW1_DESC

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_ TESTYOURMETTLE_PREEVENT
values.value: The time to Test Your Mettle is soon upon you. During this event, players of similar lord level compete for Seats of Power on a neutral kingdom. Specific buffs will be applied to you to help you in your cause, but taking and defending your seat will require one to be steadfast and ruthless.

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_BODY_WINBACK_SUBDIVE_23
values.value: Now is the best time to stay tuned in with our email newsletters.If you are not already a subscriber, tap the button below to do so now. Lucky email subscribers may get an exclusive…subscribe to find out soon! Reminder, if you are already subscribed to emails, no need to sign up again. You will be automatically eligible for the gift. Sign up now

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_NOTIF_WINBACK_FEB_23
values.value: New gift package in inventory: Claim before it expires!

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_TESTYOURMETTLE_STARTEVENT
values.value:
Lords from across multiple kingdoms compete against each other by taking and holding Seats of Power! This competition is bracketed by Lord level, providing a neutral kingdom where players of similar power can participate in the event to earn points and rewards. Players can only join the neutral kingdom that is appropriate for their level and they can return to their home kingdom at any point during the event. At the end of the event, lords will automatically return to their home kingdoms. 
Special buffs are provided to those traveling to the neutral kingdom, protecting their troops from dying and also providing combat bonuses for attacking and defending Seats of Power. In this event, the number of troops, type of gear, gear quality, and strategic timing will make all the difference.

Event Rules
-> Capture Seats of Power in the new kingdom to gain event points.
-> Seats will lock and unlock on a schedule.
-> At the end of the event, the top players will be rewarded the best rewards.

Good luck and thank you for playing Games of Thrones: Conquest

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_TITLE_TESTYOURMETTLEPREEVENT
values.value: Coming Soon: Test Your Mettle Event!

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_TITLE_TESTYOURMETTLE_STARTEVENT
values.value: The "Test Your Mettle" event has officially started!

values.name: SYSTEM_MESSAGE_TITLE_WINBACK_FEB_23
values.value: Claim your gift and grow your power!

values.name: TYM_CHAT_TAB_DESC
values.value: This chat allows you to talk with all players participating in the current event, regardless of current kingdom.

values.name: TYM_CHAT_TAB_WELCOME
values.value: Welcome to the event chat! Here you can converse with players on all participating kingdoms.

values.name: TYM_DESCRIPTION_FULL
values.value:
This is a "Test Your Mettle" event. 
During this event, you compete against players of similar keep level by teleporting to a neutral kingdom and try to capture and hold a Seat of Power.

Seats of Power in your home kingdom are locked, while Seats of Power within the event kingdoms are open. Buffs applied to participants will provide help capturing and holding a Seat of Power. Other buffs will minimize troop loss and dragon healing time.

Points are acquired periodically by holding a Seat of Power. Seats with higher star count are worth more points. At the end of the event, rewards are distributed to the players in the event kingdom with the highest point totals.

values.name: TYM_NO_KINGDOMS
values.value: No event kingdoms available. Try raising your keep level.

values.name: TYM_SCORE_TO_SEE
values.value: You must score points in this event to see the rewards.

values.name: DRIVEN_DRAGONFEEDXPBONUS_ALPHA_DESCRIPTION
values.value: Bonus to XP from Feeding your dragon
